entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
